title: Understanding Constraints
text: Constraints in Excel are rules that limit the data that can be entered into a cell. They help ensure data integrity and accuracy.

hintAnswer: a limitation on the possible values that a cell can contain
title: Identifying Constraints
text: Which of the following best describes a constraint in Excel?
choices: a limitation on the possible values that a cell can contain
a limitation on the formats the cell can contain
the formulas a cell can contain
